Specific duration limit: n/a
Wage threshold: n/a

Exceptions: Banned fo
laws.suggestion: Modify the non-compete clause to include specific, reasonable limitations, such as: "The employee agrees not to engage in competing activities within a 50-mile radius of Iowa for a period of 12 months following termination." This language complies with Iowa law, which requires reasonableness in duration, geographic scope, and activities prohibited. Ensure the clause is narrowly tailored to protect legitimate business interests.

review_notes.next_steps: Verify statute citations and effective dates
